00029 BT_GBFHTML::BT_GBFHTML(){
00030   setTokenStart("<");
00031     setTokenEnd(">");
00032     
00033     setTokenCaseSensitive(true);
00034 
00035 //  addTokenSubstitute("Rf", ")</small></font>");// end of footnote
00036     addTokenSubstitute("Rf", ")</span>");// end of footnote
00037 
00038     addTokenSubstitute("FI", "<i>"); // italics begin
00039     addTokenSubstitute("Fi", "</i>");
00040     addTokenSubstitute("FB", "<b>"); // bold begin
00041     addTokenSubstitute("Fb", "</b>");
00042     
00043 //  addTokenSubstitute("FR", QString::fromLatin1("<font color=\"%1\">").arg(jesuswords_color).latin1());        
00044     addTokenSubstitute("FR", QString::fromLatin1("<span class=\"jesuswords\">").latin1());
00045 
00046     addTokenSubstitute("Fr", "</font>");
00047     addTokenSubstitute("FU", "<u>"); // underline begin
00048     addTokenSubstitute("Fu", "</u>");
00049 
00050 //  addTokenSubstitute("FO", "<cite>"); //  Old Testament quote begin
00051 //  addTokenSubstitute("Fo", "</cite>");
00052     addTokenSubstitute("FO", "<span class=\"quotation\">"); //  Old Testament quote begin
00053     addTokenSubstitute("Fo", "</span>");
00054     
00055 
00056  addTokenSubstitute("FS", "<sup>"); // Superscript begin// Subscript begin
00057     addTokenSubstitute("Fs", "</sup>");
00058     addTokenSubstitute("FV", "<sub>"); // Subscript begin
00059     addTokenSubstitute("Fv", "</sub>");
00060 
00061 //  addTokenSubstitute("TT", QString::fromLatin1(" <h1><font color=\"%1\">").arg(text_color).local8Bit());
00062 //  addTokenSubstitute("Tt", "</font></h1>");
00063     addTokenSubstitute("TT", QString::fromLatin1("<div class=\"booktitle\">").local8Bit());
00064     addTokenSubstitute("Tt", "</div>");
00065     
00066 //  addTokenSubstitute("Ts", "</font></h2>");
00067 //  addTokenSubstitute("TS", QString::fromLatin1(" <H2><font color=\"%1\">").arg(text_color).local8Bit());  
00068     addTokenSubstitute("Ts", "</div>");
00069     addTokenSubstitute("TS", QString::fromLatin1("<div class=\"sectiontitle\">").local8Bit());  
00070             
00071 //  addTokenSubstitute("PP", "<cite>"); //  poetry  begin
00072 //  addTokenSubstitute("Pp", "</cite>");
00073     addTokenSubstitute("PP", "<span class=\"poetry\">"); //  poetry  begin
00074     addTokenSubstitute("Pp", "</span>");
00075 
00076     addTokenSubstitute("Fn", "</font>"); //  font  end
00077     addTokenSubstitute("CL", "<br>"); //  new line
00078     addTokenSubstitute("CM", "<!p><br>"); //  paragraph <!P> is a non showing comment that can be changed in the front end to <P> if desired
00079     addTokenSubstitute("CG", ">"); // literal greater-than sign
00080     addTokenSubstitute("CT", "<"); // literal less-than sign
00081     addTokenSubstitute("JR", "<span align=\"right\">"); // right align begin
00082     addTokenSubstitute("JC", "<span align=\"center\">"); // center align begin
00083     addTokenSubstitute("JL", "</span>"); // align end
00084 }
00085 
00087 char BT_GBFHTML::ProcessText(char * text, int maxlen, const SWKey * key, const SWModule * module){
00088     BT_BASICFILTER::ProcessText(text, maxlen, key, module);
00089     BT_BASICFILTER::ProcessRWPRefs(text, maxlen);
00090 
00091     //substitute \n with <BR> and \n\n* with <P>
00092 //  QString t = QString::fromUtf8(text);
00093 //  t.replace(QRegExp("\n{1,1}"), "<BR>\n");
00094 //  t.replace(QRegExp("\n{2,}"), "<P>\n");
00095 //
00096 //  text = (const char*)t.utf8();
00097 }

00099 
00100 bool BT_GBFHTML::handleToken(char **buf, const char *token, DualStringMap &userData) {
00101     if (!substituteToken(buf, token)) {  //more than a simple replace
00102     const int tokenLength = strlen(token);
00103         unsigned long i;
00104         unsigned long len = strlen(token);
00105 
00106         if (!strncmp(token, "WG", 2)){ // strong's numbers greek
00107             char num[6];
00108             for (i = 2; i < tokenLength; i++)
00109                     num[i-2] = token[i];
00110             num[i-2]=0;
00111 
00112             pushString(buf," <a href=\"strongs://Greek/%s\"><span class=\"strongnumber\">&lt;%s&gt;</span></a> ",
00113                 num, num);
00114         }
00115 
00116         if (!strncmp(token, "WH", 2)){ // strong's numbers hebrew
00117             char num[6];
00118             for (i = 2; i < tokenLength; i++)
00119                     num[i-2] = token[i];
00120             num[i-2]=0;
00121 
00122             pushString(buf," <a href=\"strongs://Hebrew/%s\"><span class=\"strongnumber\">&lt;%s&gt;</span> </a>",
00123                 num, num);
00124         }
00125 
00126         else if (!strncmp(token, "WTG", 3)) { // strong's numbers tense greek
00127             char num[16];
00128             for (i = 3; i < tokenLength; i++)
00129                     num[i-3] = token[i];
00130             num[i-3]=0;
00131 
00132             pushString(buf," <a href=\"morph://Greek/%s\"><span class=\"morphcode\">(%s)</span></a> ",
00133                 num, num);
00134         }
00135 
00136         else if (!strncmp(token, "WTH", 3)) { // strong's numbers tense hebrew
00137 
00138             char num[6];
00139             for (i = 3; i < tokenLength; i++)
00140                     num[i-3] = token[i];
00141             num[i-3]=0;
00142 
00143             pushString(buf," <a href=\"morph://Hebrew/%s\"><span class=\"morphcode\">(%s)</span></a> ",
00144                 num, num);
00145         }
00146 
00147         else if (!strncmp(token, "RB", 2)) {
00148             pushString(buf, "<span class=\"footnotepre\">");
00149             userData["hasFootnotePreTag"] = "true";
00150         }
00151 
00152         else if (!strncmp(token, "RF", 2)) {
00153             if(userData["hasFootnotePreTag"] == "true") {
00154                 userData["hasFootnotePreTag"] = "false";
00155                 pushString(buf, "</span> ");
00156             }
00157             pushString(buf,"<span class=\"footnote\"> (");
00158         }
00159 
00160         else if (!strncmp(token, "FN", 2)) {
00161             pushString(buf, "<font face=\"");
00162             for (i = 2; i < tokenLength; i++)               
00163                 if(token[i] != '\"')
00164                     *(*buf)++ = token[i];
00165             pushString(buf,"\">");
00166         }
00167         else if (!strncmp(token, "CA", 2)) {    // ASCII value
00168             *(*buf)++ = (char)atoi(&token[2]);
00169         }       
00170         else {
00171             return false;
00172         }
00173     }
00174     return true;
00175 }
